tbr.style: Big Room producer creating nasty sounds, captivating melodies with high-octane performances
achievements: Youngest artist to sign to Hardwell's Revealed Recordings at age 14
Debuted on Dimitri Vegas & Like Mike's Smash The House at age 15
Official remixes for MaRLo and AVAO
Support from Hardwell, KSHMR, Blasterjaxx, MaRLo
tbr.bio: TBR is a young German big room producer from Cologne who made history as the youngest artist to sign to Hardwell's Revealed Recordings at just 14 years old. Despite his young age of 17, he has already secured releases on major labels and collaborations with established artists, earning support from top DJs on stages like Tomorrowland and Parookaville.

dj mii.style: DJ/Producer specializing in electronic dance music with festival performances
achievements: Successfully completed DJ Mii JAPAN TOUR in 2022
Performed at ULTRA KOREA 2022 UMF radio stage
Performed at ULTRA JAPAN MAIN STAGE in 2023
Performed at ULTRA TAIWAN radio stage in 2023
dj mii.bio: DJ Mii is a DJ/Producer based in Tokyo, Japan. She has achieved significant recognition in the electronic music scene through performances at major international festivals including Ultra Music Festival events across Asia.

sihk.style: Indonesian DJ/producer known for thunderous bass booms underneath delicately woven melodies, specializing in hardcore and happy hardcore with BPM over 175
achievements: Produced for Rich Brian (formerly Rich Chigga)
Gained viral notice with unique hardcore sound
Released explosive hardcore tune 'Get Down' with Alby
sihk.bio: Indonesian DJ/producer Ricky Tjong, better known as SIHK, started his musical journey as a metal band frontman before transitioning to become Rich Brian's producer and eventually establishing himself as a hardcore DJ. Known for his unique recipe of thunderous bass booms underneath delicately woven melodies, he has garnered viral attention playing anything with a BPM over 175.

bonka.style: Big room house and electronic dance music duo known for explosive performances blending slick main room beats and epic mashups
achievements: #1 spots on Beatport
#1 iTunes Music Podcast Charts
Chart-topping singles 'Focus' and 'Chase' dominated ARIA Club Chart and U.S. Media Base Charts
#1 iTunes Dance Podcast with 'Let's Go Bonkas' monthly show
bonka.bio: Bonka is an Australian DJ/producer duo comprising Lachlan and Connor, renowned for their explosive performances and mashup expertise. They are signed to major labels like Revealed Recordings and Spinnin' Records, with chart-topping singles that have dominated international dance charts. Known as one of Australia's most sought-after lords of mash-up, they maintain a fully loaded global tour schedule and host the popular monthly show 'Let's Go Bonkas'.

scndl.style: Melbourne bounce producer specializing in high-energy electro house with heavily chopped-up synths and party-ready drops
achievements: Multiple Beatport chart releases
Shared stage with Tiësto, Diplo, Carnage, Dimitri Vegas & Like Mike, Steve Aoki
scndl.bio: SCNDL is an Australian Melbourne bounce producer who has been a key figure in shaping the genre alongside artists like Will Sparks and Joel Fletcher. Since his inception, he has achieved multiple Beatport chart successes and shared stages with major EDM artists including Tiësto, Diplo, and Steve Aoki. His releases on Monstercat, including the collaboration 'Tombstone' with Will Sparks, showcase his signature high-energy bounce sound.

red shorts boy.style: Electronic music duo specializing in electro house with unique sound
achievements: Remix included in Red Hot+Free compilation
Video premiered at Leslie-Lohman Museum of Art in New York
red shorts boy.bio: Boys' Shorts is an electronic music DJ/Producer duo from Greece. They have toured around Europe, playing in world renowned venues such as Berghain/Panorama bar and London's E1, while bringing their unique sound to major festivals.

lektrique.style: Ultra clean production of dirty bass with influences from electro, dubstep, bass house, and orchestral elements
achievements: Jesus Christ collaboration with Apashe blew up on Beatport Electro-House chart in 2012
Powerful releases on major labels like Disciple, Insomniac, and Kannibalen Records
lektrique.bio: Lektrique, aka Vincent Sergeant, is a Belgian electronic music producer who started DJing local parties at 15 and quickly fell in love with the European electro scene. In 2011, he relocated to Montreal, Canada where he linked up with Kannibalen Records. He's well known for his ultra clean production of dirty bass with influences from electro, orchestral, dubstep and more.

rayray.style: Bass-driven electronic music spanning bass house, techno, hardstyle, and four-on-the-floor house with ethereal and high-energy elements
achievements: 2013 RedBull Thre3style Nation Champion
Released debut studio album 'Unearthly World'
Performed 65 times in 16 countries in 2023
Completed 100 trips around the world
rayray.bio: RayRay is a Taiwanese DJ and producer who burst onto the international electronic music scene after winning the 2013 RedBull Thre3style competition. Known for her savage signature sound, she was quickly signed to Yellow Claw's Barong Family label where she released acclaimed EPs 'Purple Alien' and 'Alien Invasion'. Her ethereal yet bass-driven style has taken her to major festivals worldwide including Tomorrowland and Glastonbury.

mephi.style: electro house and bass house producer with influences from quality curation and sublime situations
mephi.bio: Fabio Giannacco aka Mephia was born in Modena, Italy on September 23rd, 1989. Growing up influenced by his father's mentality as a small quality trader, he became a curator of sublime situations. He produces electro house and bass house music with a focus on quality and refined musical selection.

kozah.style: Future bass producer blending hip-hop and electronic music styles with psychedelic and unconventional elements
achievements: Featured by San Holo in live sets
Released on NCS (NoCopyrightSounds)
Self-taught musician with unique sound
kozah.bio: KOZAH is a self-taught producer and DJ known for blending future bass with hip-hop and electronic elements. Notable for his collaboration 'Unleash' with Otherside and his track 'Cali4nia' released on NCS, his music showcases a talent for creating wholly original sounds that fuse different genres.

jay eskar.style: Future House and Bass House producer known for euphoric Future Bounce signature sound
achievements: Won several remix contests
Featured in Spotify editorials like Power Hour and Friday Cratediggers
Support from Alan Walker, Martin Garrix, Don Diablo
105.3K monthly Spotify listeners
jay eskar.bio: Jay Eskar is a Mexican American music producer and DJ whose alias comes from a simplified version of his birth name, Jesus Escarcega. His passion for music started at age 10, and he has since released music on major labels while gaining support from top electronic artists worldwide.

smitech wesson.style: Electronic music producer blending techno, electro, industrial sounds, and synthwave with high-energy performances
achievements: Support from Steve Aoki, The Hacker, Digitalism and Proxy
Featured on EG Spotlight series
Released 'Whisper' EP on Styx Records
smitech wesson.bio: Smitech Wesson (Murat Celik) is a Turkish electronic music producer and DJ from Istanbul, active since 2011. Known for his energetic fusion of techno, electro, and industrial sounds, he has built his profile through releases on respected labels and collaborations with notable artists in the electronic music community.

don darrell.style: bass music producer focusing on heavy, bass-driven electronic music
don darrell.bio: Don Darrell is an emerging bass music producer creating heavy electronic tracks. With a focus on bass-driven sounds, he represents the underground electronic music scene.

rankz.style: experimental bass producer specializing in heavy, atmospheric dubstep and bass music
rankz.bio: RANKZ is an experimental bass producer from Los Angeles, California, known for creating heavy, atmospheric dubstep and bass music. Operating within the underground bass music scene, RANKZ contributes to the genre's evolution with experimental approaches to traditional dubstep production.

kowz.style: Drum & Bass and Dance music producer
kowz.bio: KOWZ is an electronic music producer who has released tracks on labels like Electronyze Me and Magic Records. Known for Drum & Bass productions including the track 'Rebelion' and collaborations with artists like Matt Rysen and Godmode.

cabuizee.style: electro house with influences from hip-hop, EDM bass, and trance elements
achievements: Bruno Mars 'That's What I Like' remix reached US Billboard top 3 for remixes
Over 30 million plays collectively
45.7K monthly Spotify listeners
cabuizee.bio: Michael Jared Caabay, professionally known as CABUIZEE, is an American DJ/Producer from San Francisco who achieved international success with his remix of Bruno Mars' 'That's What I Like,' reaching the US Billboard top 3 for remixes. His musical style combines the mystical powers of ancient hip-hop with EDM bass and vocal transcendence of trance and pop. He has signed with major labels including Warner Music, Interscope, and Dim Mak, accumulating over 30 million plays collectively.

bellorum.style: Savage and accessible trap productions with a singular personality, specializing in hard trap with sharp synths and drilling beats
achievements: Track 'Alert' was played by DJ Snake during all his shows creating riots and mosh pits at major festivals
Hyped by countless artists in the trap scene
Considered one of the best of his generation
bellorum.bio: French-native Bellorum has been making music since he was six years old and is considered one of the best trap producers of his generation. His track 'Alert' became a festival anthem played by DJ Snake at major festivals worldwide, creating explosive crowd reactions. He's known for his savage yet accessible trap productions with a distinctive personality.

crude intentions.style: Versatile hardstyle producer covering tekky, raw, euphoric and uptempo styles with fresh & hard beats
achievements: Official remixes for Da Tweekaz, Le Shuuk and Primeshock
Releases on major labels including Scantraxx, Q-Dance, Insomniac/Basscon and Dirty Workz
crude intentions.bio: Crude Intentions is a Dutch hardstyle producer known for his versatile approach spanning tekky, raw, euphoric and uptempo styles. With collaborations alongside Bass Chaserz, LNY TNZ, and Ruthless, plus releases on major labels like Scantraxx and Q-Dance, he has performed at prestigious festivals including Tomorrowland and Defqon.1. His goal is to always serve his beats fresh & hard with an energetic flow.

tigerlily.style: Melbourne bounce, EDM, electro-house with big vocal samples and high-energy festival sounds
achievements: Performed at world's biggest festivals
Headlined JBL Fest 2022 with Doja Cat, Martin Garrix, The Kid Laroi and Bebe Rexha
Spotted by Tiësto which launched her international career
Classical piano training (AMEB certified)
tigerlily.bio: Dara Kristen Hayes, known as Tigerlily, is an Australian DJ and producer from Sydney who started DJing at 18 after classical piano training from age 3. She became one of Australia's biggest DJs after Dutch producer Tiësto spotted her modified AC/DC shirt at a festival, launching her international career. She has performed at major festivals like Tomorrowland, Ultra, and Lollapalooza, as well as prestigious clubs worldwide including Hakkasan Las Vegas and Club Octagon Seoul.

damn low.bio: Damn Low is an electro house artist with a growing presence in the electronic music scene.

captain curtis.style: Big room techno and hypertechno with hardstyle and electronic components, focusing on powerful beats and energetic atmosphere
achievements: Platinum awarded producer
13K Instagram followers
Residency at Bali
captain curtis.bio: Captain Curtis is an Austrian DJ and platinum-awarded producer known for his powerful big room techno and hypertechno sound. In 2023, he evolved his style towards harder and uptempo genres, leading to exciting collaborations with German powerhouses ItaloBrothers, Harris & Ford, and HBz.

cyberpunkers.style: Cyberpunk-influenced electronic music blending electro house and synthwave with contemporary sounds and an unforgiving, upfront musical mentality
achievements: International recognition through European club and festival performances
Shared stages with worldwide electronic music stars
Helped define crossover between contemporary sounds and cyberpunk aesthetic
cyberpunkers.bio: The Cyberpunkers project was created in February 2005 by two young DJs from Milan, driven by their passion for Cyberpunk culture. They gained early recognition with their first work 'SEX MACHINE' released on Excess Music, owned by famous French DJ/Producer DJ FLEX. Known for their mysterious masked identity and unique performances using dual consoles powered by multiple audio machines, they have become an international name in the electronic music scene.

dubscribe.style: Dubstep producer from Tokyo specializing in deathstep, riddim, and bass music with powerful collaborations and remix work
achievements: Nish - Dramatech (Dubscribe Remix) reached #4 on Track it down Dubstep charts
Created powerful event 'BLOCK STEPPER' collaboration
Provided remixes for Jager Meisters, Nish, and NIRGILIS
dubscribe.bio: Dubscribe is a Japanese dubstep producer based in Tokyo, known for his powerful deathstep and riddim productions. He has provided remixes for notable artists like Jager Meisters, Nish, and NIRGILIS, with his remix of 'Nish - Dramatech' reaching #4 on dubstep charts. His collaboration with Kan Takahiko resulted in the successful 'BLOCK STEPPER' event, showcasing his ability to unite different styles.

heavygrinder.style: DJ and producer blending electro house, dubstep, house, electronica, indie, and trance with darkly lovely techno brews
achievements: Multiple Beatport chart #1 hits including 'Setsuna' and 'Alone'
Regular presence on Beatport charts with singles reaching top positions
Headlining performances worldwide across Asia, Europe, and Ibiza
heavygrinder.bio: Bobbie Merveille, known as DJ Heavygrinder and Marie Vaunt, is an American DJ born in Seattle to a French father and Japanese mother, raised in Japan's Kanagawa Prefecture until age 14. Now based in Los Angeles, she performs globally at prestigious festivals and has achieved multiple Beatport chart successes. Her dual persona includes both her techno work as Marie Vaunt and her electro house/dubstep performances as Heavygrinder.

kløn.nationality: Eastern European (likely Russian/Ukrainian/Belarusian based on drift phonk origins)
kløn.style: Drift phonk producer creating music in the Russian-originated subgenre that emerged in the late-2010s, characterized by Memphis revival influences and drifting culture aesthetics
achievements: Releases on Qobuz platform
Multiple collaborative tracks
kløn.bio: Kløn is a drift phonk producer working within the Eastern European scene that has defined this subgenre. The artist has released collaborative works through labels like Phonky Town and Tribal Trap Back Catalog, contributing to the drift phonk movement that gained significant traction on TikTok and social media platforms.

mahyaar.bio: Electronic music producer working in the electro house genre.

g4bba.style: hardstyle producer known for remixes and collaborations
g4bba.bio: G4BBA is a hardstyle artist known for collaborations including 'Funky' with Charles B and 'Pinga - G4BBA Remix' with multiple artists.

salvo.style: electro house with possible influences from rap and electronic music blend
achievements: Major League Baseball events
New York Public Library performances
Make Music New York Festival
salvo.bio: Multiple artists use the name Salvo across different genres. Based on Spotify data showing electro house genre, this could be related to the electronic music scene, though specific biographical details are unclear from search results.

menso.style: French producer specializing in electro house, bass house, and disco house with ghost production services
achievements: Signed to Seriously and OTB Records in 2019 with track 'Exit'
Resident DJ at La Bergerie / La Plagne Tarentaise
menso.bio: Menso is a 21-year-old French DJ and producer who began his passion for electronic music in 2016. He gained recognition in 2019 when he signed to Seriously and OTB Records with his track 'Exit'. Now established as an electro house, bass house, and disco house producer, he also works as a ghost producer.

nezzy.style: Electronic Pop Music with Future Bass and Chill Wave influences
achievements: 6M+ streams on Spotify
Tracks signed to Armada and LoudKult
nezzy.bio: NEZZY is a 23-year-old French musician, producer and DJ specializing in Electronic Pop Music, Future Bass, and Chill Wave. With over 6 million streams on Spotify, he has released tracks on notable labels including Armada and LoudKult, with his new album 'nothing last forever' set for release in May 2025.

wolfhowl.style: electro house DJ and producer with energetic electronic sound
wolfhowl.bio: Juan José Linés, best known as Wolfhowl, is a 25-year-old DJ and producer from Valencia, Spain. He began his music career in 2015 when he started playing shows, and after a few months decided to focus on music production as well.

spektrum.style: London-based house act with electronic dance music incorporating synths, programming, and vocals
achievements: No. 1 song on UK Dance Chart in 2007 with 'Dirty'
spektrum.bio: Spektrum is a London-based house act formed in 2000, consisting of Gabriel Olegavich (synths, programming, vocals) from South East London and other members including vocalists and musicians. The quartet achieved commercial success with a No. 1 UK Dance Chart hit in 2007.

wckid.style: Multi-genre electronic producer specializing in electro house, future bass, trap, and melodic dubstep
achievements: Featured on Rolling Stone India
Multi-genre versatility spanning house to lo-fi beats
wckid.bio: WCKiD is an Indian electronic music producer known for his fluid sonic identity and versatility across multiple genres. He gained recognition with tracks like 'Waiting For You' and 'Eternity', and actively collaborates with international artists while maintaining a diverse production style ranging from electro house to melodic dubstep.

odeeon.style: introspective and atmospheric UK Garage and Electronica, moving beyond standard club anthems with deeply personal journey elements
achievements: multi-instrumentalist
sound designer
odeeon.bio: Italian producer, multi-instrumentalist and DJ born in Rome, known for bringing an introspective and atmospheric twist to UK Garage and Electronica. Real name Matteo Barcaiolo, he creates deeply personal musical journeys that move far beyond standard club anthems.

achilles.style: Big room house and electro house producer specializing in mainstage dance music with powerful, energetic tracks
achievements: Debuted at no. 64 in the 2022 Global Top101 Producers
Joined forces with GUS G in 2022
Rising star in mainstage dance music
achilles.bio: Producer-DJ Andrew Achilleos, better known as Achilles, debuted at no. 64 in the 2022 Global Top101 Producers and is currently one of the hottest rising stars in mainstage dance music. His live shows are electric, having toured with high-calibre names and played world-famous festivals. Achilles creates raw and energizing big room house tracks that dominate the festival circuit.

dntless.style: Future bass and electro house producer working with chillstep and melodic bass elements
dntless.bio: Electronic music producer specializing in future bass, electro house, chillstep, and melodic bass. Limited public information available about this emerging artist.

alva gracia.style: Future house producer and trackmaker specializing in ghost production and mastering services
achievements: 6 years of music production experience
Signed to multiple international labels
Specialized in ghost production services
alva gracia.bio: Alva Gracia is an Indonesian trackmaker based in Jakarta who has been creating and developing his craft for almost 6 years. He is signed to notable labels including HEXAGON, Loud Memory, CHARGE RCRDS, and Youth Energy, and specializes in future house production while offering ghost production and mastering services to other artists.

tomatow.bio: Tomatow is a future bass artist with a popularity score of 23 on Spotify. Limited information is available about this emerging artist in the electronic music scene.

biometrix.style: Cinematic bass music blending Future Bass, Melodic Electronic, Trap, Dubstep, Drum & Bass, and EDM with dark and uplifting elements
achievements: Over 100 million streams
Harley Quinn track TikTokked over 120,000 times with 10+ million plays
Sync placements with Hyundai, Huawei, Nike, Puma
biometrix.bio: London-based Biometrix is a rapidly-emerging singer and electronic music producer creating cinematic bass music that blends Future Bass, Trap, and Dubstep influences. With over 100 million streams and major label credits including Warner Chappell and Universal, he's established himself as a versatile artist spanning EDM to Lo-Fi hip hop. His viral track 'Harley Quinn' with Sarah De Warren has garnered over 10 million plays and 120,000 TikTok uses.

gomad! & monster.style: Electronic rock band blending rock, metal, and electronic music with industrial elements
achievements: Won Best Bass Music Artist award at the Vicious Music Awards
Opened for The Prodigy during their Baltic Tour
Recorded performance for Spain's public television (RTVE)
gomad! & monster.bio: GOMAD! & Monster are an electronic rock band from Madrid, Spain, formed by DJs, producers, and musicians who broke into the Spanish electronic music scene in 2012. They aim for the perfect synthesis of rock, metal, and electronic music, creating a distinctive sound with exhilarating live performances that feature drums and guitar alongside electronic production.

ryscu.style: melodic bass and future bass producer creating emotionally resonant electronic music
ryscu.bio: ryscu is a melodic bass and future bass producer who has collaborated with various musicians. Their notable work includes the track 'Call It Off' featuring Mary Sweet, showcasing their ability to blend bass-heavy drops with emotional melodies.

cashew.style: Energetic tech house and bass house producer known for unique and high-energy tracks
achievements: Tracks played by Oliver Heldens, Tchami, Diplo, Jauz, Firebeatz
Releases on major labels like Confession and Mixmash Records
International club performances from USA to Japan
cashew.bio: CASHEW is a 24-25 year old up-and-coming producer and DJ from Croatia who has made a name for himself in the dance music scene with his unique and energetic tech/bass house tracks. His high-quality productions have earned him releases on renowned labels like Confession, Terminal Underground, and Mixmash Records. His tracks have gained support from major industry acts and have been played by famous DJs such as Oliver Heldens, Tchami, Diplo, and Jauz in popular clubs worldwide.

polar youth.style: Belgian female producer blending drum and bass with diverse electronic elements
achievements: Most Promising Artist at Red Bull Elektropedia Awards
Nearly a decade in electronic music
polar youth.bio: Polar Youth is a Belgian female producer and DJ who has been an underrated veteran in the electronic music scene for nearly a decade. She was crowned Most Promising Artist at the Red Bull Elektropedia Awards and has collaborated with notable artists like DJ Fresh on "All Night" and remixed TokiMonsta's "Sci Fi".

r-cue.origin: Melbourne, Australia (born in Colombo, Sri Lanka)
r-cue.style: Australian rapper, singer, songwriter, and DJ known for video/audio remixes
achievements: Gained radio and TV popularity at young age
Reputation as one of the best in the industry
Master of unique style
Started DJ-ing and remixing at age 14
r-cue.bio: R-CUE (C Rathnayake) is an Australian rapper, singer, songwriter, and DJ born in Colombo, Sri Lanka but based in Melbourne. He gained radio and TV popularity at a young age for his video/audio remixes and has built a reputation as one of the best in the industry. His passion for DJ-ing, remixing and video editing started at age 14, impressing many with his skills including TV stations.

fatesky.style: bass house and g-house producer focusing on hypnotic beats and infectious melodies
fatesky.bio: Fatesky is an electronic music producer working within the bass house and g-house genres. The artist creates music in the style pioneered by acts like Amine Edge & Dance, focusing on the energetic and underground electronic dance music scene.

soxx.style: bass house, electro house, and uk garage producer
soxx.bio: SOXX is an electronic music producer specializing in bass house, electro house, and UK garage styles. With a Spotify popularity score of 31/100, they represent the underground electronic music scene.

mastad.bio: MASTAD is an electronic music artist. Limited information is currently available about their background and musical career.

vowed.style: tropical house and deep house producer based on Spotify genres
vowed.bio: Electronic music artist working in tropical house and deep house genres with a popularity score of 36/100 on Spotify.

pepperjuice.style: House music duo combining experience with fresh talent
achievements: Supported by David Guetta, Don Diablo, Dimitri & Like Mike, Hardwell, The Chainsmokers, R3hab, Afrojack
15.1K monthly listeners on Spotify
pepperjuice.bio: Pepperjuice is a French house music duo composed of Solberjum & Feynris, combining experience and freshness. Created in mid-2019, they emerged from the Broderskab collective co-founded by Solberjum. After Solberjum's extensive world touring including Las Vegas, Hong Kong, Shanghai, Singapore, Miami, and other major cities, the duo now promises a strong and impactful music and image universe.

mosimann.style: Electro House pioneer who redefines DJing by fusing live performances with electronic productions, incorporating DJing, live percussion, singing and keyboards
achievements: Ranked 6 years in DJ Mag Top 100 DJs
Won French TV reality show Star Academy at age 20
Regularly cited among top 5 French DJs worldwide
900,000 sales
Platinum disc for Grand Corps Malade's 'Mesdames' album
Performed at Olympia Paris
mosimann.bio: French-Swiss DJ and producer who started his career in Saint-Tropez at age 14, later won Star Academy and evolved into an electro house pioneer. Inspired by Jean-Michel Jarre, Daft Punk and Laurent Garnier, he redefined live DJ performance by incorporating percussion, vocals and keyboards. Known for both underground electronic productions and mainstream collaborations with major French artists like Grand Corps Malade and Amel Bent.

ricardo moreno.style: energetic happy hardcore and hardstyle with a positive twist
achievements: notable track 'City Streets' with Charly Lownoise & Re-Style
beloved remixes and bootlegs in the hard dance scene
ricardo moreno.bio: Ricardo Moreno is a Dutch DJ who started his career in the early 90's and has been dedicated to music most of his life. His DJ skills have been showcased at major festivals across the Netherlands and internationally, with highlights accumulating both in his home country and abroad. He has produced numerous solo tracks and collaborations with renowned artists in the hard dance scene.

whitemask.style: electro house producer with masked persona
whitemask.bio: Whitemask is an electro house artist who maintains anonymity through a masked persona, following in the tradition of other electronic music artists who perform behind masks.

monk mafia.style: Music NFT project focusing on electronic/digital music collaborations
achievements: First Music NFT project in Asia
Multiple NFT Music Project launches
Celebrity collaborations
monk mafia.bio: Monk Mafia appears to be Asia's first Music NFT project, empowering individual artists by connecting them directly to fans and investors through their own music NFT platform. The project focuses on launching multiple NFT music collaborations and has partnerships with notable figures including Nirvana Chaudhary and celebrity photographer Donald Chan.

nathalie blue.style: hardstyle and frenchcore producer, part of the harder electronic music scene
achievements: Has releases on Beatport
Active in the hardstyle/frenchcore scene
nathalie blue.bio: Nathalie Blue is an electronic music producer working in the hardstyle and frenchcore genres. She has established herself in the harder styles scene with releases available on major platforms like Beatport.

edmmaro.style: Hard techno producer who fuses bass and electronic music with trash, memes, and classic international and Italian music
achievements: First release on Danza Records
Regular performer at Nameless festival
edmmaro.bio: EDMMARO is an Italian hard techno producer known as 'the Italian EDM killer' who blends contemporary bass and electronic sounds with trash phenomena, memes, and classic music without genre distinctions. He made his debut as the first release on Danza Records with a hard techno remix of the historic track Metro, and has become a regular fixture at Nameless festival with outstanding results.

sides.style: hard techno producer with underground electronic sound
sides.bio: SIDES is a hard techno artist emerging from the underground electronic music scene. With a focus on driving beats and industrial soundscapes, SIDES contributes to the evolving hard techno movement.

aly$hia.style: Techno DJ and producer known for hypertechno sound, part of the Dark Side of Techno movement
achievements: DJANE MAG Asia's Top 100 DJs multiple times
Active since 2012 with worldwide recognition
aly$hia.bio: ALY$HIA is a Taiwanese DJ and producer who has been making waves in the techno scene since her debut in 2012. She has been awarded DJANE MAG Asia's Top 100 DJs multiple times and has gained fame in the industry worldwide. Known for her involvement in the Dark Side of Techno movement, she represents the hypertechno sound with her powerful performances.

notxerius.bio: NOTXERIUS is an electro house artist. Based on Spotify data, they operate within the electro house genre with a popularity score of 23/100.

sesco.style: Big room house and electro house producer known for current upfront sounds and high-energy club performances
achievements: Won EDM Droid Macau number 1 DJ award in 2019
Performed in over 40 cities across the globe
Entertainment Manager at Para nightclub
sesco.bio: Originally hailing from London's underground party scene, SESCO has been DJing since the age of 14 and built his name on pirate radio. He moved to China in 2011, establishing himself in Shanghai before settling in Macau in 2013, where he became a resident at premier nightclubs and eventually Entertainment Manager at Para. His rise to fame has seen him perform across Europe and Asia, establishing himself as an international crowd pleaser.

fahjah.style: Electronic music producer specializing in bass house and rage rap with multi-genre compositions
achievements: Remix of Martin Garrix, Sander Van Doorn, and DVBBS' 'Gold Skies'
Track 'Lose Control' with Haus of Panda
Albums including 'Bang Face 2023: Long May She Rave'
fahjah.bio: Kassandre Maharajh, aka Fahjah, is a Canadian electronic music producer born in Regina, Saskatchewan in 1996, now based in Winnipeg. Known as one of the city's busiest nightclub DJs, his drive and passion for music keeps him creating original compositions that blend multiple genres including bass house and rage rap.

maikki.style: Hard Dance producer specializing in hardstyle and big room house with mainstage appeal
achievements: Rising Star in Hard Dance Scene
Releases on major labels including Dim Mak and Spinnin
Professional singer/songwriter/producer
maikki.bio: Maikki is a rising star in the Hard Dance scene from Sydney, Australia, known for collaborations with major artists including Steve Aoki, Blasterjaxx, and Dr Phunk. Signed to 120 Publishing and TMRW Recordings, she has released music on prestigious labels like Dim Mak, Spinnin, Circus, and Revealed Recordings. Her sound combines hardstyle and big room elements, establishing her as a prominent voice in the electronic dance music landscape.

cørt.style: hypertechno producer creating aggressive, high-energy electronic music
cørt.bio: CØRT is an emerging artist in the hypertechno scene, contributing to the aggressive techno movement that has been gaining popularity in clubs and electronic music platforms.

walschlager.style: High-energy electronic music producer specializing in electro house and bass house with constantly evolving fresh material
achievements: Booked at Shambhala Music Festival 2025
walschlager.bio: Walschlager is a German electronic music producer who embodies the essence of evolution in electronic music. Known for constantly creating fresh material, they deliver high-energy performances that keep fans and peers on their toes, specializing in electro house and bass house genres.

brave the storm.style: Unknown - search results show multiple unrelated artists with similar names
brave the storm.bio: Unable to determine accurate biography due to conflicting search results showing multiple different artists with similar names across various genres.

achievements: quickly rising to international prominence
member of Intaresu collective
vacult.bio: US-born and Berlin-based artist vault. is quickly rising to international prominence for his deep and driving productions. He is a member of the Intaresu collective together with Isaac Elejalde and Hypnoize.

virzient.bio: Virzient is an electronic music producer working in the bass music and dubstep genres. With a focus on heavy bass-driven compositions, they contribute to the evolving landscape of modern electronic dance music.

lny tnz.style: Dutch hardstyle and crossover virtuoso specializing in Hard Dance with a genre-bending 'FVCK GENRES' approach
achievements: First hardstyle track featured in Fortnite ('So Easy' with Da Tweekaz)
Releases on major labels worldwide
Global festival performances
lny tnz.bio: LNY TNZ is a Dutch hardstyle sensation and crossover virtuoso who started as a duo almost two decades ago by Mitchell Vreeswijk and Jan Stadhouders. Now a solo act and founder of label FVCK GENRES, he's known for his genre-bending approach and global festival performances. His collaboration 'So Easy' with Da Tweekaz made history as the first hardstyle track featured in Fortnite.

kill the clowns.style: Electronic music duo known for energetic shows, wild outfits, and big beats that make everyone dance
achievements: Shared stage with Steve Aoki, David Guetta, Deorro, Lil Jon, and Galantis
Over 354,000 Facebook followers
Known for viral videos and #TROLL content
kill the clowns.bio: Kill The Clowns are a Mexican DJ and producer duo from Aguascalientes with over 3 years in the electronic music scene. Both coming from families of musicians and DJs, they have created a unique project featuring energetic shows with wild outfits and big beats. They have established themselves in Mexico and around the world, sharing stages with major artists like Steve Aoki and David Guetta.

dj junior (tw).style: Hardstyle and big room electronic dance music producer
achievements: Performed at Tomorrowland 2018
Started own production in 2013
Released on major electronic music platforms
dj junior (tw).bio: DJ Junior is a Taiwanese electronic music producer specializing in hardstyle and big room sounds. He has performed alongside major artists including Jay-Z, Pitbull, Avicii, R3hab, Afrojack, and Fatboy Slim, and notably performed at Tomorrowland 2018 in Belgium. Since 2013, he has been producing original tracks and remixes, establishing himself as a prominent figure in Taiwan's electronic music scene.

highup.style: EDM and big room house producer with sophisticated delivery, tapping into dance music with finesse
achievements: 'Memories' with DJ Soda garnered 1 million+ streams in 4 weeks on Spotify
Founder of Purple Fly Records label imprint
highup.bio: Gold Coast born and bred electronic producer and artist Highup has tapped the EDM and big room house world with finesse, collaborating with certified icons from Snoop Dogg to DJ Soda. Powerful in his delivery while leaving a sophisticated mark on dance devotees, he's the curator behind his own label imprint Purple Fly Records while being signed to global innovators including Sony Music, Revealed Recordings, and Spinnin'.
